title: Vesicularia montagnei
text:
Vesicularia montagnei is a species of <a href="moss">moss</a>. It is used in <a href="aquascaping">planted aquariums</a> as an ornamental underwater plant, commonly referred to as Christmas moss.
It is found in Australia, China, Japan, India, Indonesia, the Philippines, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Sudan, and Vietnam. In its natural habitat it grows in damp situations on rocks and the trunks of trees.
